attributes.action: Enforce reasonable use of sirens in residential areas for ambulance and police vehicles
attributes.additional_details:
This is to enforce the police and ambulance vehicles to use their sirens sensibly in the residential areas.
The unnecessary use of sirens during quiet morning hours or after 11 pm doesn’t contribute to the general decline in trust and respect of the police forces and doesn’t do much more than annoy people.

Living near Shepherds Bush roundabout area, for example, is like living at a warzone with sirens screaming mad every 10-20 minutes.  It appears they go to lunch with their sirens on.

Please sign this petition to make them start considering the taxpayers well-being and use the sirens according to the regulations of use in the residential areas.
